trans-unit.source: Manages a configuration element that contains a set of criteria used by a client application to search for workflow services over a network or the Internet.
Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.Configuration.FindCriteriaElement"></xref> class.
Gets a collection of configuration elements that contain the names of workflow service contract types.
Gets or sets the maximum time to wait for replies from services on a network or the Internet.
A timespan object the defines the waiting period.

Gets the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.XmlElementElementCollection"></xref> object that provide extensions for a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.Configuration.FindCriteriaElement"></xref>.
Gets or sets the maximum number of replies to wait for, from services on a network or the Internet.

If <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.Configuration.FindCriteriaElement.MaxResults%2A> replies are received before <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.Configuration.FindCriteriaElement.Duration%2A> has elapsed, the find operation ends.

Gets or sets a URI that designates the name and location of a service that is being searched for and against which members of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.Configuration.FindCriteriaElement.Scopes"></xref> collection are matched.
The URI of a service application.

Gets a collection of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.Configuration.FindCriteriaElement"></xref> objects that contain absolute URIs that are used during a find operation to locate a specific service or services.
If the specific service is found, a successful match has been made between the service URI and the Scope URI, sometimes with the help of scope rules that handle complications of matching.
A collection of elements that contain URIs.
